synopsis.text: Yuru Camp is back, and this time, our beloved characters are not just camping, but building a campground from scratch! Rin Shima, now a working woman in Nagoya, receives a surprise message from Chiaki Oogaki, who is tasked with revitalizing a closed campground in Yamanashi Prefecture to boost tourism. Rin suggests involving their old camping buddies, Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Ena Saitou, and Aoi Inuyama, leading to a reunion filled with nostalgia and shared memories of their high school camping days. Together, they embark on this new adventure, combining their skills and passion for camping to create a space for future generations to enjoy, all while reminiscing about their youthful escapades.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
